Package common

Class ChangeWindow

java.lang.Object
common.ChangeWindow
public class ChangeWindow extends Object
This class main purpose is to display windows, changeScreen display a regular scene usually called after hide of the previous scene, and showPopup to display a pop up window with the wanted information.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ChangeWindow()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    changeScreen(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, String fxmlPath)
    This method used to open and display a new scene using an FXML file , apply the project CSS to it and make it movable by dragging.
    void
    makeUndecoratedScreenMovable(javafx.scene.Parent root, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
    This method makes the screen movable by holding and dragging the mouse
    void
    showPopUp(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, String popUpTitle, String popUpMessage, String imagePath, String linkToString, javafx.event.ActionEvent eventToClose)
    This method uses the showPopUp method of class ChangeWindow to display a pop up window on screen, it also can transfer user to a new screen when pressing OK or X on the pop screen.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ChangeWindow

      public ChangeWindow()

  • Method Details

    • changeScreen

      public void changeScreen(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, String fxmlPath)
      This method used to open and display a new scene using an FXML file , apply the project CSS to it and make it movable by dragging.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the stage we want to open the FXML on
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML file

    • makeUndecoratedScreenMovable

      public void makeUndecoratedScreenMovable(javafx.scene.Parent root, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      This method makes the screen movable by holding and dragging the mouse
      Parameters:
      root - the parent instance of the screen
      primaryStage - the stage which we want to make movable

    • showPopUp

      public void showPopUp(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, String popUpTitle, String popUpMessage, String imagePath, String linkToString, javafx.event.ActionEvent eventToClose)
      This method uses the showPopUp method of class ChangeWindow to display a pop up window on screen, it also can transfer user to a new screen when pressing OK or X on the pop screen.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the stage for the new pop up screen
      popUpTitle - the title of the pop up screen
      popUpMessage - the message shown in the pop up screen
      imagePath - the image to show in the pop up screen (null if don't want to show image)
      linkToString - the FXML path to a new screen if the wanted action when pressed OK or X on pop up is to transfer user to a new screen (null if want to stay on same screen)
      eventToClose - the ActionEvent from the current screen to close it before transferring to a new screen (null if want to stay on same screen)
